title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server that lets you pull, run, and manage large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models from any Python script.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; chat, stream, and embed with local Ollama models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration layer that wraps Ollama models for chains, agents, retrieval, and tool-calling workflows.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama-WebUI) for chatting, model management, RAG, and multi-user workspaces.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama exposing sync/async chat, generate, pull, and embedding endpoints.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem to interact with the Ollama server; chat, stream, and manage models from Ruby/Rails.

title: ollama-cli (rust)
summary: Rust crate providing typed APIs and an interactive CLI for Ollama; supports chat, generate, pull, and embeddings.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as GitHub-Copilot-style autocomplete and chat.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes clusters with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official container images (CPU & CUDA) for running Ollama server in Docker and Docker Compose stacks.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes for integrating Ollama with Flask, Next.js, LangChain, RAG, function-calling, and more.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration that lets you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C#/.NET client for Ollama with chat, generate, pull, and embedding methods.

title: ollama-tools
summary: Collection of community utilities: model converters, GGUF quantizers, OpenAI-compatible proxy, and more.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Streamlit app that combines Ollama with ChromaDB for private RAG-style Q&A over PDFs and text files.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-gpt4all-importer
summary: Script to convert and import GPT4All GGUF files into Ollama’s model library with a single command.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that lets teams chat privately with local Ollama models via mentions or slash commands.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian community plugin to run local LLM completions and summarizations inside your vault notes.
